body_html: @bhack You can always access the parameters after and make changes. E.g. use module->get_parameter(name). Generally see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/module.h for things you can do with a module.
body_text: @bhack You can always access the parameters after and make changes. E.g. use module->get_parameter(name). Generally see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/module.h for things you can do with a module.
body: @bhack You can always access the parameters after and make changes. E.g. use [`module->get_parameter(name)`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/module.h#L351). Generally see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/module.h for things you can do with a module.
